message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. This price takes into account the value you placed on the product, while also ensuring I get a fair return on my investment. Let's meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000. This is a fair price that should satisfy both of us.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one final push to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. This is as close as I can get to my target price while still being fair to both of us.

I've made a serious offer of $900000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think that's a fair price for the product. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider other options.
